collection_db_type.description: The storage method for the collection of collections.

settings_db_type.description: The storage method for the collection of settings. If this is not 'file' then the necessary settings to connect must be passed into the api function.

file_storage_path.description: The name of the folder where to put collections stored in the file system.

jwt_secret.description: The secret key used to encode your json web tokens. It's important this is kept unique and secret.

postgresql_uri.description: The full path to your postgres database. E.g. postgres://username:password@host/db

mongodb_uri.description: The full path to your mongo database.

installed.description: Whether the site has gone through the install process

installed_modules.description: List of installed modules with relevant info

print_400_errors.description: Print messages to console for each request with a 4xx response code.

logging_level.description: The minimum severity level to preserve logs in the log collection.

enforce_permissions.description: Whether permissions should be checked. Only turn off if needed for testing.
